description: The poinciana (Caesalpinia gilliesii) is an amazing flowering shrub that is renowned for its vibrant orange, yellow and scarlet blossoms. Blooming from late spring to fall, the poinciana adds an eye-catching splash of vivid colour to any outdoor space. Its strong, bushy growth habit also make it an ideal choice for providing free-standing shelter for small bird and butterfly species. Not only does this plant have an incredibly long flowering season- from late spring to late fall- it also requires minimal maintenance, making it the perfect shrub for the busy gardener. Its stunning colour and hardy nature make the poinciana an ideal choice for any landscape.
